Once [PAWN_pronoun] had achieved full mastery, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to share [PAWN_possessive] wisdom by teaching rock class at a local community college, training others in the knowledge of rock and also warning them about the dangers of global warming.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a ranch specializing in frogs. [PAWN_pronoun] raised many different species of frog, including some of the more exotic ones.
